AzureBlade: Don't... (he gasps) aagh!

He closes his eyes and focuses on his spark. It was as if there was a 
mix of a distress call with a cry of fury emanating from a single 
point and hitting his spark like a tidal wave crashing on rocks.

AzureBlade: By all the Matrix and the sparks in it! Kup! Get to 
Maximal base and fast!

> : : Kup : :
>

> temporary...
> 
> Kup drives on.
